Gensokyo:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
Gensokyo:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

Gensokyo:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
Gensokyo:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
Gensokyo:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

Gensokyo:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
Gensokyo:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

Gensokyo:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
Gensokyo:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage [E] times. NL (Deal !Gensokyo:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

Gensokyo:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
Gensokyo:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable and !Gensokyo:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.
